casebody.data:
Wilson PUENTE
v.
PROGRESSIVE NORTHWESTERN INSURANCE COMPANY Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 27, 2018

John C. Turner, Jr., Bridgeport, in support of the petition.

John W. Cannavino, Jr., Stamford, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn. App. 852, 188 A.3d 773 (2018), is denied.

ROBINSON, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
